国外的两个大神：SkythekidRS和CaptainSparklez同时出现！

CAN WE GET 30,000 LIKES?! WATCH AS SKY DOES HIS BEST TO KEEP CONTROL OF HIS PRISONERS USING THE NEWEST PORTAL GUN TECHNOLOGY FROM APERTURE LABS!
